actions.name: Damp

cost.trigger: A creature in range uses an [Explode] attack or ability.

actions.description:
Trigger: A creature in range uses an [Explode] attack or ability.

Effect: The triggering action fails and becomes @Affliction[disabled] 5 if it was an attack, or @Affliction[nullified] 5 if it was an ability.

system.description:
Trigger: A creature in range uses an [Explode] attack or ability.

Effect: The triggering action fails and becomes @Affliction[disabled] 5 if it was an attack, or @Affliction[nullified] 5 if it was an ability.
